description: Schema for a single onboarding JSON file that contains all users within all companies on the platform.

company_id.title: Company ID
company_id.description: Internal company ID, e.g., group policy number, required if no company_internal_id.

company_name.title: Company name
company_name.description: Name of the company as it should appear on the platform, required if no company_internal_id.

employee_id.title: Employee ID
employee_id.description: Unique within company, e.g., policy number. Optional if email is present.

activation_date.title: Activation date
activation_date.description: Date when account should become active in ISO 8601 format, i.e., YYYY-MM-DD. Required. Should be a future date.

termination_date.title: Termination date
termination_date.description: Date when account should be terminated in ISO 8601 format, i.e., YYYY-MM-DD. Optional.

group.title: Group
group.description: Internal group to assign the user to, for companies that organise users into groups. Optional and can be left empty if not relevant.

country_code.title: Country code
country_code.description: User's country, 2 letter country code, uppercase, optional.

locale.title: User locale
locale.description: User's locale string in ISO/IEC 15897 format, e.g., en_GB, pt_BR, etc. Optional.

birthday.title: Birthday
birthday.description: User's date of birth in ISO 8601 format, i.e., YYYY-MM-DD. Optional.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: Optional, can be empty or any of the following: male, female, other.

work_start.title: Work start date
work_start.description: Date when the employee started working for the company in ISO 8601 format, i.e., YYYY-MM-DD. Optional.

phone_mobile.title: Mobile phone number
phone_mobile.description: User's mobile phone number, should be in international format, optional.

phone_work.title: Work phone number
phone_work.description: User's work phone number, should be in international format, optional.

region.title: Region
region.description: Region of work of the individual

sub_region.title: Sub region
sub_region.description: Sub region of work of the individual

city.title: City
city.description: City of work of the individual

location_site.title: Work location/site
location_site.description: Location or site out of which the individual works

work_status.title: Work status
work_status.description: Work status of the individual (e.g. Active, STD, LTD, leave, terminated, etc)

management_status.title: Management status
management_status.description: Designation of whether or not the person manages individuals

division.title: Division
division.description: Highest level department/division/group of the individual

division_sub1.title: Subdivision 1
division_sub1.description: Second highest level department/division/group of the individual

division_sub2.title: Subdivision 2
division_sub2.description: Third highest level department/division/group of the individual

division_sub3.title: Subdivision 3
division_sub3.description: Fourth highest level department/division/group of the individual

union_status.title: Union status
union_status.description: Union status of the individual (e.g. union, non-union)

pay_type.title: Payment type
pay_type.description: Pay type of the individual (e.g. hourly, salary, commission)

preferred_language.title: Preferred language
preferred_language.description: Preferred language of communication for the individual (e.g. English, French, German, etc)

custom_cut1.title: Custom field 1
custom_cut1.description: First custom demographic field of  the individual (unique to the organization)

custom_cut2.title: Custom field 2
custom_cut2.description: Second custom demographic field of  the individual (unique to the organization)

custom_cut3.title: Custom field 3
custom_cut3.description: Third custom demographic field of  the individual (unique to the organization)

custom_cut4.title: Custom field 4
custom_cut4.description: Fourth custom demographic field of  the individual (unique to the organization)

custom_cut5.title: Custom field 5
custom_cut5.description: Fifth custom demographic field of  the individual (unique to the organization)

sso.title: SSO access
sso.description: Indicates whether the user should be accessing by SSO or not

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: Set of roles for user (strings comma-separated)

invitecode.title: Invitation code
invitecode.description: This is added to the company's prefix to generate the unique registration code, optional.

rfc-5322.title: Email
rfc-5322.description: User's email address as defined in RFC 5322, optional if employee_id is present.
